_comment: TODO: Needs translation to Yoruba. Currently using English as placeholder.

deleteNote.title: Are you sure?
deleteNote.message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the note.

deleteSalesRep.title: Are you sure?
deleteSalesRep.message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove this sales representative.

logout.title: Sign Out
logout.message: Are you sure you want to sign out from your account?

deleteProduct.title: Delete Product
deleteProduct.message: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.

deleteSale.title: Delete Sale
deleteSale.message: Are you sure you want to delete this sale? This action cannot be undone.

deleteStore.title: Delete Store
deleteStore.message: Are you sure you want to delete this store? This will delete all products and sales associated with this store.

withdrawal.title: Withdraw Your Earnings
withdrawal.processingNote: Withdrawals are processed within 24-48 hours. Ensure your account details are correct.

cart.title: [TRANSLATE] Cart
cart.name: [TRANSLATE] Name
cart.addItemsToStart: [TRANSLATE] Add items to start making a sale
cart.pleaseSelectPriceOption: [TRANSLATE] Please select a price option for
cart.retailPriceNotAvailable: [TRANSLATE] Retail price not available for this product
cart.wholesalePriceNotAvailable: [TRANSLATE] Wholesale price not available for this product
cart.saleSavedOffline: [TRANSLATE] Sale saved offline and will sync when you're back online
